posts.title: Sour & Collins Drinks
posts.text: SOURMIX is made of concertrate of Lemon/ Lime/ Sugar/ sometime Egg whites.This drinks are handshken a& Blened. GLASSES: (page 23) Rocks/ Collins/ Fiest Grandefor Margaritas/ Beer Mug/ HurricaneFrozen Drinks/ Martinis Garnish: all Sour Drinks with Cherry/ LIT with Lemon/ Margaritas with Lime DaiquiriStraight up/ on the Rocks/ FrozenStrawberry Daiquiri no sour mix, with Stawberry Daiquiri Mix 123456in the stright up glass=Maritini glass / rock glass / hurricane glass.1.5oz (6 counts) Light Rum, e.g.BacardiSour Mixshakecherry and Lime BELOW USE MARITINIS GLASS OR ROCK GLASS Whiskey Sour12341.5oz whiskeysour-mixshakecherry Midori Sour12341.5oz Midori (melon liqueur)Sour-mixshakecherry Amaretto Sour12341.5oz Amaretto (sweet almond liqueur)Sour-mixshakecherry ##THE COLLINS GLASS Tom - GinJohn - Whisky Collins - Tall Glass Tom (Gin) Collins123456ice1oz GinSour-mixshakeclub soda / 7 upcherry + orange John(whiskey) Collins123456ice in collins glass1oz whiskeysour-mixshake/ club soda / 7-upcherry + orange Jock(Scotch) Collinsthe other types: Vodka Collins/ Rum Collins/ Brandy Collins Sloe Gin Fizz123456ice 1oz sloe ginsour-mixshakeclub soda / 7-upcherry + orange MARGARITASINVENTED IN Mexico, liquor with Tequila.Various of flavors: Melon/ Raspberry/ Peach/ Strawberry etc. Frozen, Rocks, Strright up Margaritas1234561oz Tequlia0.5oz Triple SecSourMixhint of Lime JuiceshakeLime Weadge Blue-Rita: replace Triple Sec to Blue CuracaoCadillac-Rita: 1oz Patron + 0.5oz Cointreau, Lime Squeeze, SourMix, Float of Grand MarnierLong Island ICED TEA2 COUNTS 0.5oz EACH of HOUSE LIQOURS:vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec with Sour-mix and Coke float L.I.T.123456below o.5oz eachvodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple secsour-mixshakecokelemon Long Beach Ice Tea123450.5oz each of vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple secsour-mixshakecranberry juicelemon Adios MoFo a.k.a. Blue Long Island123450.5oz each of vodka, gin, rum, tequila, Blue Curacosour-mixshake7-uplemon L.A. posts.title: Highballs
posts.text: HIGHBALLS is 1 part liquor to 2 parts of mixer. 1oz 4 pours /1.5oz 6 pours /2oz 8pours GLASSES: Standard/ English / Footed (page 27) highball123ice1 oz whiskey: Scotch/ Bourbon/ whiskey etc.Gingle Ale Gin & Tonic1234ice1oz Gin TonicLime Wedge 7 & 71234ice1oz Seagram's 77up/spritelime the other Brand : crown&7, Jack&coke, Beam&Coke etc. Cuba Libre1234icerum (light rum: Barcardi)cokeLime Screw Driver1234ice1oz vodkaorange juiceorange slice Harvey Wallbanger a.k.a. Banger12345ice1oz vodkaorange juice0.5oz Galliano Floatorange slice Galliano(orange & vanilla flavor cordial liqueur) Sole Comfotable Screw12345ice0.5oz Sole Gin0.5oz Southern Comfortable Boubonorange juicecherry So-Co-Screw against Wall > add Galliano float Tequila Sunrise12345ice1oz Tequila orange juiceGrenadinecherry Tequila Sunset is Grapefruit Juice Grey Hound12345ice1oz vodkagrapefuit juicerim with salt is Salt Dog Fuzzy Navel1234567ice1oz Peach Schnappsorange juiceorange weel garnishHairy Naveladd 1 oz vodka Cape Cod1234ice1oz vodkacranberry juicelime Madras12345ice1oz vodkahalf orange juicehalf cranberry juicecherry Sex on the Beach1234ice0.5oz codka0.5oz peach schnappsorange juice + cranberry juice Sea Breeze1234ice1oz vodkahalfway grapefuit juicehalfway cranberry juice Bay Breeze1234ice1oz vodkahalfway pineapple juicehalfway cranberry juice Mellow BayBreeze1234ice1oz Mailbum Rumhalfway pineapple juicehalfway cranberry juice

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. menu TestCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
